summary: A graduate Bachelor of Science in Accountancy. Objectivity, confidentiality, professional behavior, integrity, expertise and thoroughness are, besides the pillars of my study, qualities that I consider paramount in life. I have skills in administrative and fiscal services, control and analysis of processes within organizations and council in before mentioned areas.

profile_positions.description:
As a Business Controller at Ogilvy I work in a highly dynamic, international and creative environment that creates experiences and design that shape every aspect of a brand’s needs. 

I am responsible for accounting, reporting and initiation of process related projects. My tasks include periodic reporting of the month/quarter/year end closings, preparation and monitoring of the budgets and forecasts and business performance reviews. By reviewing these assignments, I am able to drive continuous improvement for the company.

Furthermore, I work closely with the management team, the international network, the local account teams and our clients regarding financial matters and projects. This can be related to performances, management reports, new business and process improvements. I make sure to continuously communicate with all stakeholders involved to be able to consistently optimise our efforts and goals.
profile_positions.title: Business Controller

profile_positions.description:
Being a Financial Accountant at First Sponsor Group covered multiple (financial) tasks. I was in charge of development, improvement and maintanance of Real Estate reports, I provided balance sheet specifications, VAT declarations/filings and I was responsible for forecasting and budgetting of multiple properties (Mondriaan Tower, Arena Towers, Tribes Zuiderhof, among many others in the Amsterdam Area).

To develop and improve the communication and work flow, I was working closely with the Finance and Reporting team from Singapore and Property Managers in Europe, that were associated with the Real Estate portfolio, on a day to day basis. Simultaneously I was managing 2 Finance Assistants with their tasks and monitoring their reports while making sure they had room to improve their skills.

Additionally I monitored and processed cash flows, supported various month/quarter/year end closings and I assisted in appointed projects and services related to said properties.
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant Real Estate

profile_positions.description:
At A.S. Watson I was responsible for composing internal and external (stock) reports, handling of stock discounts, stock corrections, reciprocal deliveries and balancing a reliable administration of inventory flows.

Additionally, I reviewed and analyzed stock inventory related reports, proactively recognized  developments in stock,  accounted for parts of the ledger period closings through balance sheet specifications and I managed the quality of inventory files.

Apart from functioning as a Junior Stock Accountant, I also actively supported several (department transcending) projects in inspections, reports and ad hoc activities.
profile_positions.title: Junior Stock Accountant

profile_positions.description:
As a Collections Specialist for the Middle East and Africa Region I was responsible for monitoring and maintaining assigned accounts, account adjustments, small balance write offs, customer calls and customer reconciliations. I was accountable for reducing delinquency for assigned accounts and responsible for adequate collection calls and/or correspondence in a fast paced goal oriented Collections Department.

I analyzed and interpreted financial information, provided customer service regarding collection issues, processed customer refunds, processed and reviewed account adjustments, resolved client discrepancies and short payments. Furthermore I performed other assigned tasks and duties necessary to support the Accounts Receivable Department.

To optimized the processes I enlisted the efforts of the Sales Department and Senior Management when necessary to accelerate the collection procedures. I communicated and followed up with the Sales Department regarding customer accounts on a timely basis and established and maintained effective, efficient and cooperative working relationships with customers.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Receivable Specialist MEA Region

profile_positions.description:
During my graduation assignment, I successfully optimized the sale and supply chains of the ‘Materiaalbureau’, a government department in Amsterdam. The ‘Materiaalbureau’ focuses on infrastructure and traffic services. 

The goal of this project was to gain insight in the efficiency and effectiveness of their processes, inspect the possibilities for uniform procedures and create recommendations and suggestions on how to improve their administrative organization.

I used Risk Assessment from COSO ERM while working closely with the business controller and the manager of the department. Furthermore, I reported my progress periodically with the department and the faculty of my study.

Based on my findings, the organization started working on the implementation and renewal of their systems and activities and the competence of their practices.
profile_positions.title: Graduation Assignment Materiaalbureau Gemeente Amsterdam

•	Administrative support for the personal care per client;
•	Provide assistance with the optimisation of the input; and
•	Corrective actions regarding the declaration of the various forms of care within the organisation.

Additionally, I was appointed as a troubleshooter for soft- and hardware related issues within the organization, to support the employees with their daily work activities.
profile_positions.title: Backoffice Employee

profile_positions.description:
During this traineeship, I gained knowledge and experience in the field of all aspects of financial services:

•	Bookkeeping
•	Tax returns
•	Preparations of interim financial statements, profit and loss statements and annual accounts.

Furthermore, I was responsible for the implementation of a new software system for the time sheets. I managed to link the time sheets to the payroll software to optimise and improve the payroll process.
profile_positions.title: Accounting Trainee
